name: KIKI-N-THE-BALZ
description:
Overview

KIKI-N-THE-BALZ is a 3D game where you play as Kiki, the last true ball. Your goal is to get as many score as you can in one run by kiki'n down the power-hungry balz from the platform that serves as the playground.  The game is endless so only the more and more angry balz and hideous traps stand between you and your next highscore! :) 

Features
  • unlimited playtime, unlimited fun!
  • gradually increasing difficulty, only your skills are the limit
  • simple but beautiful graphics
Controls

The game was optimized for gamepad controls and was tested on a DualShock 4 controller. Alternatively you can use WASD or arrow keys on your keyboard.

Third party assets used in the game
  • elfstonepress - boing-sfx
  • bevibeldesign - small explosion
  • SquirmTheVerm - Rolling Ball Loop
  • StygalAlexander - Calamity GO GO demo loop
  • jchiledred - chopping magazine
  • joedeshon - thumping_on_a_plastic_bottle

All these assets were downloaded from freesound.org.
